Autumnal Glory Festival

4
Maetriks
Friday, August 11th, 2017, 6:23:57 PM

With the fading of summer heat into brisk winds on a chilly night, we welcome the colors of autumn and the harvest that it brings. Please join the Alliance of High Elven Society as we celebrate the changing of the seasons in Ta'Vaalor for our first annual Autumnal Glory Festival, the first weekend of Jastatos (October 6 - 8, 2017).

For a complete list of events and times, please see our GSWiki page: https://gswiki.play.net/AutumnalGloryFestival#ScheduleofEvents. If you wish for your group to participate, please feel free to submit a registration form: https://goo.gl/forms/OfcUuwaT3hFhwH0V2.
